column5: I have a really nice 2 bd 2 bath apartment. You would have your own private bathroom and bedroom. During your stay, I will provide coffee and simple breakfast items.  I want to make your stay as stress free as possible! If you need anything or have any questions, don't hesitate to ask! I can also provide rides to places if you need a lift!
column8: Private room and bathroom 10 minutes from DT
